## Vector3.inverse() method

Inverse a Vector3

**Signature:**

```typescript
static inverse(v: Vector3, result?: Vector3): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  v | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The input vector |
|  result | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | _(Optional)_ The output vector (can be the same vector as v). if not specified, a new vector will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)

The output vector
